data.description: MidAmerican Energy Company is seeking a student pursuing a bachelorâ€™s degree in engineering graduating later than August 2026. Renewable Generation Engineering interns will be exposed to a variety of projects and activities that occur within the energy industry. Interns will have the opportunity to apply their knowledge and skills learned through college and apply them to the workplace. The position is temporary, nonexempt, and full-time/hourly through the summer.
